Summary: red flashing orbe hovers 5 feet over lake and makes spiratic movements.
divs: sighting detailsi was at a lake called lake garda, in burlington\farmington ct. with a friend. it's late around midnight when i see something out on the lake. hard to even focus on at first on the account of it being so dim. a few seconds later it begins to get a lot brighter, to the point where it is clearly clearly visible. then the object starts to move about, going right, left, up, and down. never moving in a circular motion, only at angles. it moved so fast at one point that it a created a red trail, or so my eyes perceived. then another astonishing movement, it disappeared then a few seconds later the object re-appeared about 50 feet away from its original point of origin. yet preceded to return to central point after every spasm. at first i thought it could just be some kids on the shore on the other side playing with some sort of light, but when i say it was hovering over the water, you could see the reflection on the water directly beneath the object. so i could put a perspective on where the object was placed, obviously not on shore. it was in front of all of the trees and bushes and looked quite large. the first thing that made me notice this was a weird kind of sound emanating from that direction. did not sound mechanical. it had more of a grunt. something sounded vocal. but not necessarily human. this happened once, and a sound was never heard again. what ended the confrontation was just a disappearance. it just stopped blinking and that was the end of it. i couldn't see a rough outline of maybe a solid object. this object was more ethereal. i take things like this very seriously, and am not hoaxing. the point of this report is for my own knowledge to see if anyone else in the area has seen anything similar. thank you for your time, patrick
